pullRequest.title: Feature/2421/link orcid
pullRequest.bodyText:
#2421
I'm sure it's missing something but I could use some feedback

commit.message: set token username to username from ORCID response
added orcid fields to dockstore yml template

nodes.bodyText:
Think build might be dying because these are set as required.
Either add dummy values to the dropwizard config files used or allow these to be empty.
Didn't you say they have a sandbox API? If so, shouldn't this be defaulting to that? Although I guess we don't have tests anyway for this because of the need for credentials.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -123,6 +125,10 @@ uiConfig:
   zenodoRedirectPath: /auth/zenodo.org
   zenodoScope: deposit:write deposit:actions
 
+  orcidAuthUrl: https://orcid.org/oauth/authorize

nodes.bodyText: Log the exception itself as well.

commit.message: Merge branch 'feature/2421/link-orcid' of https://github.com/dockstore/dockstore into feature/2421/link-orcid

nodes.bodyText: This is currently fine since there are no join tables in Token otherwise select count would've been better.
Make sure that the openapi.yaml changes that are checked-in roughly matches the swagger.yaml changes
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -618,6 +625,66 @@ public Token addBitbucketToken(@ApiParam(hidden = true) @Auth User user, @QueryP
         }
     }
 
+    @POST
+    @Timed
+    @UnitOfWork
+    @Path("/orcid.org")
+    @ApiOperation(value = "Add a new orcid.org token", authorizations = {
+            @Authorization(value = JWT_SECURITY_DEFINITION_NAME) }, notes = "This is used as part of the OAuth 2 web flow. "
+            + "Once a user has approved permissions for ORCID, "
+            + "their browser will load the redirect URI which should resolve here", response = Token.class)
+    @Operation(operationId = "addOrcidToken", summary = "Request and store tokens from ORCID API", security = @SecurityRequirement(name = "bearer"))

commit.message: check in openapi yaml; reset CUSTOM_DIR_NAME
using variables for endpoint summaries and descriptions

nodes.bodyText: Hide User and update the openapi.yaml
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1342,6 +1381,33 @@ info:
   version: 1.9.0-alpha.4-SNAPSHOT
 openapi: 3.0.1
 paths:
+  /auth/tokens/orcid.org:
+    post:
+      description: Using OAuth code from ORCID, request and store tokens from ORCID
+        API
+      operationId: addOrcidToken
+      parameters:
+      - in: query
+        name: code
+        schema:
+          type: string
+      requestBody:
